title: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI option
description: In the SWT example ControlExample, when the user selects the SWT.MULTI option under the Text tab, the application unexpectedly emits a beep sound. This behavior seems incorrect and should be investigated.
OB: When selecting the SWT.MULTI option under the Text tab in the ControlExample application, a beep sound is heard.
EB: When selecting the SWT.MULTI option under the Text tab in the ControlExample application, no beep sound should be heard.
SR:
1. Launch Build F1 (20020521) on Win2K.
2. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
3. Navigate to the Text tab.
4. Click on the StylesSWT.SINGLE option.
5. Click again on the StylesSWT.MULTI option.
6. Observe if a beep sound is emitted.
